definition.text: Thailand is a constitutional monarchy in Southeast Asia with a diversified, export-oriented economy. Historically the Kingdom of Siam, it avoided formal colonization and underwent gradual modernization in the late 19th and early 20th centuries. Since the late 20th century, Thailand has developed strong manufacturing sectors‚Äîparticularly automotive and electronics‚Äîalongside tourism and agro-industrial exports, integrated into regional and global value chains.
